mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User_info (id, password, name, birth, phone_no, email, type) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, TO_DATE(#{birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{phoneNo}, #{email}, 'member')
